short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speaks aloud text in web pages
short.es: Habla en voz alta el texto en páginas web
short.fr: Parle à haute voix le texte des pages web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free extension with a few Premium features, see below. 

Speak any text on a website by selecting it, point with the mouse to hear text and links and captions, or click Play to hear sentences read out with highlighting to let you keep track of where you are. 

Read Google Docs documents back to you so you can proof your work and fix any errors. 

Speak accessible PDFs opened in Google Chrome with highlighting by clicking the Play button.

Hear letters, words or sentences spoken back as you type. Simply type in to web pages and hear what you type as you type it. For letters, hear the letter names or sounds spoken back to you, whichever helps you understand better. 

Turn on a coloured overlay so pages are tinted to the colour you find easiest to read - no more glaring black on white text. 

Change the speed of the spoken voice, slower for comprehension, faster for efficiency. 

Activate word prediction to help you with writing and composition - find that elusive word you want. Now includes subject-specific prediction dictionaries and larger base dictionaries!

Read the contents of Google Docs extensions aloud so your support tools speak.

PREMIUM FEATURES!

Upgrade to a Premium subscription and also gain: 

● Scan from Screen, so you can select inaccessible images like Google Books and hear them read aloud. 

● Spelling and Homophone checking in Google Docs, Microsoft Office 365 Word Online and other editable text areas.

● Speech Recognition. Enter text in to documents and text areas of web pages through dictation.

● Reading with highlighting in Microsoft Office 365 Word.

● More online text-to-speech voices. 

From the developers of ClaroRead for Mac and Windows and the ClaroSpeak and ClaroPDF Apps.
long.es:
Lea cualquier texto de una página web. Pulse «Reproducir» para escuchar el texto leído y marcado para poder seguirlo. 

Relea sus documentos de Google Docs para poder revisar su trabajo y corregir cualquier error. 

Escuche PDF accesibles.

Escuche letras, palabras o frases a medida que escribe.

Active una capa transparente de color para que las páginas se tiñan del tono en el que le sea más fácil leer. 

Active la predicción de palabras para obtener ayuda con su escritura y redacción.

De los desarrolladores de ClaroRead para Mac y Windows y de las aplicaciones ClaroSpeak y ClaroPDF.

Es fantástico para realizar exámenes, revisar su trabajo y para cualquier con problemas como la dislexia.
long.fr:
Faites lire n’importe quel texte sur un site Web. Cliquez sur Lecture pour entendre le texte lu en surbrillance afin de savoir où vous êtes. 

Faites lire les documents Google Docs pour vous-même afin de vérifier votre travail et de corriger les erreurs. 

Faites lire les PDF accessibles.

Entendez les lettres, les mots ou les phrases prononcés pendant que vous tapez.

Activez une superposition colorée pour que les pages prennent la couleur la plus facile à lire. 

Activez la prédiction des mots pour vous aider avec la composition et la rédaction.

Fait par les développeurs de ClaroRead pour Mac et Windows et les applications ClaroSpeak et ClaroPDF.

Idéal pour les examens, la vérification de votre travail et toute personne ayant un problème de type dyslexie.
long.nl:
Leest alle teksten op een website voor. Klik op Afspelen om een tekst te laten voorlezen met markering zodat u weet welk stuk voorgelezen wordt. 

Leest Google Documenten voor zodat u uw werk kunt controleren en fouten kunt verbeteren. 

Leest toegankelijke PDF-documenten voor.

Hoor letters, woorden of zinnen terwijl u ze typt.

Geef pagina’s een kleur die u makkelijk vindt om te lezen. 

Activeer woordvoorspelling om u te helpen met schrijven en opstellen.

Van de ontwikkelaars van ClaroRead voor Mac en Windows en de ClaroSpeak- en ClaroPDF-app.

Geweldig voor examens, om uw werk te controleren en voor iedereen met leesproblemen zoals dyslexie.
long.no:
Speak any text on a website by selecting it, point with the mouse to hear text and links and captions, or click Play to hear sentences read out with highlighting to let you keep track of where you are. 

Read Google Docs documents back to you so you can proof your work and fix any errors. 

Speak accessible PDFs opened in Google Chrome with highlighting by clicking the Play button.

Hear letters, words or sentences spoken back as you type. Simply type in to web pages and hear what you type as you type it. For letters, hear the letter names or sounds spoken back to you, whichever helps you understand better. 

Turn on a coloured overlay so pages are tinted to the colour you find easiest to read - no more glaring black on white text. 

Change the speed of the spoken voice, slower for comprehension, faster for efficiency. 

Activate word prediction to help you with writing and composition - find that elusive word you want. 

Read the contents of Google Docs extensions aloud so your support tools speak.

Select from English, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, or Chinese voices. Or use any voice installed on your computer, like the high-quality range of voices provided by ClaroRead - just select the voice in your computer's settings. Or upgrade to Premium and choose from Catalan, Chinese, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish or Swedish online voices (using your Internet connection).

Upgrade to Premium and also gain Scan from Screen, so you can select inaccessible images like Google Books and hear them read aloud. 

From the developers of ClaroRead for Mac and Windows and the ClaroSpeak and ClaroPDF Apps.
long.sv:
ClaroRead Chrome läser upp texten på en webbsida och i Google docs genom att du markerar den, pekar på texten med musen eller använder "Klicka och spela" för att få texten uppläst med markörmedföljning.

Lyssna på tecken, ord eller meningar när du skriver. 

Du kan ändra hastigheten av uppläsningen.

I premiumversionen tillkommer:
Högkvalitativa röster från Acapela
Skanna från skärm 

Vill du ha mer information om premiumversionen eller vill prova en demoversion kan du kontakta oss på 0454300808 eller info@svensktalteknologi.se  

Några exempel på tillgängliga språk: Svenska, Engelska, Arabiska, Spanska, Franska, Italienska, Japanska, Koreanska, Kinesiska, Katalanska, Danska, Nederlänska, Finska, Tyska, Norska, Polska, Portugisiska, Ryska.
